attributes.action: stand down and give the job as prime minister to somebodyelse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think many many people will agree with me, that when mr brown took over the job as prime minister, this country went down hill, it was already going down hill, but it is going faster now than ever before. and it is now time for change and have a person that can do the job and be a people person and not hide unlike mr brown does a very good job at.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
